channel.description: CC 410 - Week 4 Wrapping Up 2/14 - Documentation, Testing, UML 2/14 - Doc & Testing Example 2/14 - Restaurant 2 This Week 2/21 - Inheritance & Polymorphism 2/21 - Inheritance Example Start - Stop - Continue Survey Some Final Project Time Next Week 2/28 - Debugging & Logging 2/28 - Lambda Expressions 2/28 - Debugging & Logging Example 2/28 - Restaurant 3 2/28 - Final Project 2 Milestone 3 All General Requirements Add Inheritance Refactor Classes New Unit Tests Update UML Diagram ~1500 LOC Feedback welcome!
